column4: I just woke up, and noticed my pc had shut down, I want to know why, how do I locate the reason as to why it shut down?
thunderstorms? power failure? :) those wont get logged.
in my house this week. its been the grandson pushing buttons on the   pc when no ones looking.
lol nah no thunder storms or any kids near my setup :), I hope he didnt cause any severe damage with sudo ;)
